entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Goderich
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:30 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Goderich 3:00 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023
Temperature: -2.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa falling
Humidity: 84 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -4.5°C
Wind: NNE 18 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Periods of ice pellets and a few flurries changing to periods of light snow mixed with ice pellets this evening. Risk of freezing rain early this evening. Local snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 4. Wind chill near minus 16. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clearing. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Clearing in the evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023
